item.title: Pictures with Kittens - Codeforces
item.description: Link đề bài: https://codeforces.com/contest/1077/problem/F2. Hướng dẫn: Code mẫu: #include <iostream>#include <queue>#define pb push_back #define FOR(i, a, b) for(int i = int(a); i <= int(b); i++) #define FORD(i, a, b) for(int i = int(a); i >= int(b); i--) #define REP(i, r) for(int i = 0; i < r; i++) #define FAST ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0); cout.tie(0); #define READFILE freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin) #define WRITEFILE freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout); #define ll long long #define ii pair<int, int> #define fi first #define se second using namespace std; const int MAX= 5005; ll n, k, x, a[MAX], f[MAX][MAX]; deque<int> pq; void Insert(int col, int row){ while (pq.

item.title: Boredom - Codeforces
item.description: Link đề bài: https://codeforces.com/contest/455/problem/A. Hướng dẫn: Code mẫu: #include <bits/stdc++.h>#define pb push_back #define FOR(i, a, b) for(int i = int(a); i <= int(b); i++) #define FORD(i, a, b) for(int i = int(a); i >= int(b); i--) #define REP(i, r) for(int i = 0; i < r; i++) #define FAST ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0); cout.tie(0); #define READFILE freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin) #define WRITEFILE freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout); #define ll long long #define ii pair<int, int> #define fi first #define se second using namespace std; const int MAX= 1e5+6; ll n, a[MAX], Mx, cnt[MAX], f[MAX], pi; int main() { #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE READFILE; #endif FAST; cin >> n; for(int i=1; i<=n; i++) cin >> a[i]; for(int i=1; i<=n; i++){ cnt[a[i]]++; Mx = max(Mx, a[i]); } for(int i=1; i<=Mx; i++){ f[i] = max(f[i-1], f[pi] + cnt[i]*i); if (f[i-1] > f[pi]) pi = i-1; } cout<< f[Mx]; return 0; } Tham khảo: https://robert1003.
